title: Stage Lv10-S13
description: Level 10 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Phew, what a relief! I was really worried about that.
Ah, that's great! Finally, it's all sorted out.
learning_points: Level 10 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: Phew, what a relief! I was really worried about that.
Ah, that's great! Finally, it's all sorted out.
Wow, that's a weight off my shoulders!
Thanks, that really puts my mind at ease.

sentences.kr: 정말 잘됐다! 이보다 좋을 순 없어.
sentences.en: That's wonderful! It couldn't have worked out better.
Ah, now I can finally breathe easy!
Perfect! I'm absolutely satisfied with that.
Finally! It was worth the wait after all.
